title: Koopa Paratroopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Air Support**: Carry a Koopa member in the air, Giving immunity to all negative effects and redirecting attacks randomly to their alive neighbors.
- **Pester**: Annoy a player, Redirecting them to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will lose your defense for the night if you are Roleblocked.
- Astral and Rampage attacks ignore your defense.
- You may not target yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 1944
*That's a Koopa Paratroopa. Well, umm... It's basically a Koopa Troopa with wings.*
